ygData.subject: Re: Nagafen Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/9/99 11:16:40 AM Eastern Daylight Time, dmitry@nival.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/9/99 11:16:40 AM Eastern Daylight Time, dmitry@...
writes:

<< I believe problem is some enchanter spell, because i was
fighting with necros many times and only if enchanter was nearby i was
facing such problem. I was feared and charmed before and it never cause
me such problems, so single charm or fear is ok. >>


I think you are correct. I am fighting Evil Eyes (enchanters) in Beholders
and this has happened to me three times and also to my partner. THis is
serious BUG!!!! It happens to me only sometimes, but only when I have been
casted on by an EE and usually after being Charmed. the only way I can get
out of it is by Disconnecting.

Wizaro WrathCaster
Solusek Ro
